alert.note: Alert for Glacier Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 23 at 8:50PM AKST until January 24 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW AND FREEZING RAIN CONTINUE ACROSS PORTIONS OF THE NORTHERN PANHANDLE THROUGH TUESDAY... .Snowfall continues across parts of the northern panhandle. Over the inner channels near Juneau, snow has become wetter but temperatures have remained cold enough to stay as snow. Precipitation rates will significantly diminish beginning Wednesday morning followed by a break through Thursday. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...Gustavus. * WHEN...Until midnight AKST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...We have recieved reports of the snow becoming wetter and mixing with rain.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water with you in case of an emergency. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
